title: Wolkenatlas (Der)
notes: 2012 Wachowskis/Tom Tykwer epic adaptation of David Mitchell novel with Tom Hanks, Halle Berry across six timelines - ambitious 3-hour narrative experiment

title: Wrestler -  Ruhm, Liebe und Schmerz
notes: 2008 Darren Aronofsky drama with Mickey Rourke as washed-up pro wrestler Randy 'The Ram' Robinson - Venice Golden Lion winner, comeback role

title: Yiyi (OMU)
notes: 2000 Edward Yang Taiwanese family epic spanning generations in Taipei - 3-hour masterpiece, distinctive humanist style, Cannes Best Director

title: Z – Anatomie eines politischen Mordes
notes: 1969 Costa-Gavras political thriller about Greek leftist assassination with Yves Montand - Oscar Best Foreign Film, distinctive Algerian setting allegory

title: Zardoz – Der Bote des Todes (USA/GB ´1974_/TR)
notes: 1974 John Boorman dystopian sci-fi with Sean Connery in post-apocalyptic 2293 - cult classic with distinctive bizarre imagery

title: Zehn Kanus, 150 Speere und 3 Frauen (AUS ´2006)
notes: 2006 Rolf de Heer/Peter Djigirr Australian Indigenous film told entirely in Yolngu Matha language about ancestral story - distinctive anthropological narrative
